p: (2) Effect of Subacute Treatments of Rats with HS Extract on Albumin and Total Bilirubin. The mean values for albumin (A) and total bilirubin (B) of rats after 30 days of intervention have been shown in Figures 3. No significant effects have been observed in the levels of bilirubin and albumin of rats treated with 500, 1000, and 2000â€‰mg/kg of HS extract ( P > 0.5).
